buffs.description: Upon reviving as a Human, the enemy's crystal HP on the stage battle is partly reduced. Reduced by 1% for every 5-star unit and 2% for every 6 star unit. Applied even when in Time Shop, and the unit's maximum crystal HP cannot be reduced by more than 30%.
buffs.name: Weaken Crystal (Human)

buffs.description: Increases stats of all soldiers (Attack / Defense / HP) by 7 levels for ever 5-star unit, 15 for every 6-star unit. Applies in Time Shop, but cannot exceed 250 levels. (However, [Might of Fire] is only applied in stage battles.)
buffs.name: Might of Fire

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it Increases the Attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily Grants immunity against physical attacks.
Increases its movement speed by 10%, and its attack range by 9%.
Increases the movement speed of all units by 7%, and the attack speed of all units by 9%.
Significantly increases attack power and critical hit rate against enemy crystal.
Weaken Crystal (Human) Limit Break : The reduction of enemy's crystal HP due to Weaken Crystal (Human) is increased up to 30%.
Might of Fire Limit Break : The max value of the effects of Might of Fire by Flame Sibyl increases from 150 to 250.
description.skill1: Upon reviving as a Human, the enemy's crystal HP on the stage is reduced. (1%, 2%, 3%, 4%, 5%)
description.skill2: Increase additional medal buff by pets (0%, 0%, 3%, 5%, 7%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Flame Sibyl ]
